data.title: Commander Nilpfred Website
data.description: A new website for my punk rock band built with React. With use of CSS animations, scroll snap, a shop item carousel and much more.

data.title: Rick and Morty Memory Game
data.description: React project on days 38 - 39 of 'The Odin Project' web development course. Main focus on useEffect hooks and fetching external data in React.

data.title: Members Only
data.description: Express project on days 54 - 55 of 'The Odin Project' web development course. Main focus on give authorized users exculsive access, using Express.js and MongoDB.

data.title: Fake Shop
data.description: React project on days 43 - 45 of 'The Odin Project' web development course. Main focus on routing and testing React with Vitest.

data.title: Battleship
data.description: JavaScript project on days 23 - 30 of 'The Odin Project' web development course. Main focus on test driven development with Jest.

data.title: Interactive CV Generator
data.description: React project on days 35 - 37 of 'The Odin Project' web development course. Main focus on using React, esp. useState hooks, Vite and Vercel.

data.title: Personal Portfolio v1
data.description: HTML/CSS project on days 35 - 37 of 'The Odin Project' web development course. Main focus on responsive web design.

data.title: Weather App
data.description: JavaScript project on day 22 of 'The Odin Project' web development course. Main focus on async functions / promises and APIs.

data.title: To Do List
data.description: JavaScript project on day 19 of 'The Odin Project' web development course. Main focus on object oriented programming, factory functions and classes.

data.title: Admin Dashboard
data.description: HTML/CSS project on day 13 of 'The Odin Project' web development course. Main focus on CSS Grid.

data.title: Rock Paper Scissors
data.description: JavaScript project on day 6 of 'The Odin Project' web development course. Building a first JavaScript project from scratch and get used to using Git.

data.title: Tic Tac Toe
data.description: JavaScript project on day 15 of 'The Odin Project' web development course. Main focus on factory functions and module pattern.

data.title: Etch-A-Sketch
data.description: JavaScript project on day 7 of 'The Odin Project' web development course. Main focus on DOM manipulation and event listeners.

data.title: Landing Page
data.description: HTML/CSS project on day 3 of 'The Odin Project' web development course. Main focus on CSS Flexbox.
